text: Question 17 Recall that Belady's anomaly is that the pages-fault rate may increase as the number of allocated frames increases. Now consider the following statements: S1: Random page replacement algorithm (where a page chosen at random is replaced) suffers from Belady's anomaly S2: LRU page replacement algorithm suffers from Belady's anomaly Which of the following is CORRECT ? e S1is true, S2 is true e S1istrue, S2 is false e S1is false, S2 is true @ S1is false, S2 is false GATE CSE 2017 SET-1 Operating System
